title: WOW! RARE 2BD/2BH WITH  W/D,  GYM, POOL-WALK TO BOSTON REDLINE
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 133046613', 'Rent: $3,800/ Month', 'Beds: 2', 'Bath: 2', 'Available Date: Now, , or  August', 'Pet: Pet Friendly', 'Parking:: attached garage', 'FEATURES', '90-Inch Outdoor Televisions', 'Caesarstone Countertops', 'Courtyard with BBQ Grilling Stations', 'Coworking Spaces and Conference Room', 'Glass Showers', 'Indoor Bike Storage & Repair', 'Indoor Pet Wash', 'Lounges', 'Modern Stainless Steel Appliances Moen Fixtures', 'Moen Fixtures', 'Oversized Windows', 'Peloton Bikes', 'Pool with Cabanas and Sun Deck', 'Tile Backsplashes', 'Two Club Rooms with Catering Kitchen', 'Two State-Of-The-Art Fitness Centers', 'Wood Plank Flooring', 'Yoga Space', 'Another Level Realty LLC', 'Call Now', '617 888 6265', "IF THIS PROPERTY DOESN'T FIT YOUR NEEDS, FEEL FREE TO CALL OR EMAIL ME.", 'I HAVE THOUSANDS OF OTHER PROPERTIES.', 'All information furnished herein is from sources deemed reliable, it is represented subject to errors, omissions, change of price, prior sale or lease, or withdrawal without notice.', 'All dimensions are approximate.', 'For exact dimensions, please hire your own architect or engineer.']
